title: The Wolf Among Us Episode 1 to 5 RePack by MAXAGENT
description:
===============================
Released Episode 1 - Faith: October 11, 2013 
Released Episode 2 - Smoke And Mirrors: February 4, 2014 
Released Episode 3 - A Crooked Mile: April 8, 2014 
Released Episode 4 - In Sheep's Clothing: May 27, 2014 
Released Episode 5 - Cry Wolf: July 8, 2014 
Genre: Strategy (Real-time) / 3D / Economic 
Developer: Telltale Games 
Publisher: Telltale Games 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: Russian (Only Episode 4) / English 
Language: English 
Tablet: enclosing "CODEX" 
Game Version: v.1.0.0.1 

===============================
Operating system: Windows XP (SP3) / Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 
Processor: Core 2 Duo E4600 2.4GHz / Athlon 5050e Dual Core 
Memory: 4 GB 
Hard disk space: 6 GB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 
Video: ATI or NVidia card with 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹RAM (Not recommended for embedded gaming graphics cards from Intel)

===============================
From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking Dead, comes a gritty, violent and mature thriller based on the award-winning Fables comic books (DC Comics/Vertigo). As Bigby Wolf - THE big bad wolf - you will discover that a brutal, bloody murder is just a taste of things to come in a game series where your every decision can have enormous consequences. 

An evolution of Telltale's ground-breaking choice and consequence game mechanics will ensure the player learns that even as Bigby Wolf, Sheriff of Fabletown, life in the big bad city is bloody, terrifying and dangerous.

===============================
